name: Hastilude
description:
Hastilude is a competitive and co-op action game for 1 to 4 players. Climb atop your mount and soar into battle using your wits, reflexes, and an array of weapons and special abilities against your opponents. Dismount your foes and swoop in for the score!



Hastilude includes:

  • Multiple gameplay modes including Versus, Campaign, Hunt, and more
  • Vibrant hand-drawn, high-resolution animation
  • Unique characters with their own special attributes — your choice matters
  • An armory of weapons and items that interact with players and each other
  • A bounty of beautiful arenas each with their own tricks, traps, and hazards
  • Tricky AI opponent options for solo play or training
  • Combat system that's accesible to beginners with an underlying depth for expert players
  • Optional tutorial modes for both new and advanced players
